item.title: length contraction
item.description: Apa yang akan terjadi saat sebuah jam cahaya bergerak dengan cepat, mendekati laju cahaya, adalah jam akan melambat detaknya [1]. [2] [3] notes John D. Norton, “Special Theory of Relativity: Clocks and Rods”, HPS 0410 Einstein for Everyone, 15 Jan 2022, url https://sites.pitt.edu/~jdnorton/teaching/HPS_0410/chapters/Special_relativity_clocks_rods/index.html [20220410]. David Appell, “The invisibility of length contraction”, Physics World, Institute of Physics, IOP Publishing, 13 Aug 2019, url https://physicsworld.com/a/the-invisibility-of-length%E2%80%AFcontraction/ [20220410]. Carl Rod Nave, “Muon Experiment”, HyperPhysics, 2017, url http://hyperphysics.
